mapper.update: update tb_song set status=#{status} where id=#{id};
update tb_song set hits=hits+1 where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select a.id,a.songName,b.singerName as singer,a.fileURL,a.hits from tb_song a,tb_singer b where a.singer=b.id and a.status='1' ORDER BY hits DESC LIMIT 5
